title: How AI Agents Will Transform DevOps Workflows for Engineers
author: João Freitas
description: AI agents promise to remove the toil from the engineer role and empower them to get back to the creative work that brings in customers and revenue.
cntitle: AI Agent 将如何改变工程师的 DevOps 工作流程
cndescription: AI 代理有望消除工程师角色中的苦工，并使他们能够回到带来客户和收入的创造性工作中。
